CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( Rating_Rate__c < 100 , "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(AND( Rating_Rate__c >100, Rating_Rate__c<=1000) , "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(AND( Rating_Rate__c >1000, Rating_Rate__c<=2000) , "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(AND( Rating_Rate__c >2000, Rating_Rate__c<=3000) , "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(AND( Rating_Rate__c >3000, Rating_Rate__c<=4000) , "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Rating
